checker.sourceparser
Class PHPSourceParser

java.lang.Object
  checker.sourceparser.PHPSourceParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
SourceParser
public class PHPSourceParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements SourceParser

PHPSourceFileParsing takes php source file content and parses php code sections for comments and references.
